longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival.  

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months for holders
of normal passports issued by Korea (Dem. People's Rep.). 
Additional Information:
- Visitors of Haitian origin do not require visa to enter or
  transit Haiti. 
- Visitors (except those of Haitian origin) are required to
  hold documents required for their next destination.
Warning:
- Nationals of Korea (Dem. People's Rep.) who have visited
  Guinea, Liberia or Sierra Leone within the last 28 days will
  be refused entry.
- Nationals of Korea (Dem. People's Rep.) who have visited
  Guinea, Liberia or Sierra Leone more than 28 days ago must
  hold a health certificate issued by a government-certified
  medical institution in one of the above mentioned countries
  , proving that the holder is Ebola virus free.
- Visitors (except those of Haitian origin) not holding
  return/onward tickets could be refused entry
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Passengers transiting countries with risk of yellow fever
  transmission provided not leaving the transit areas.
Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis. malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  falciparum exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: B, or C if chloroquine is not
  available pre-travel.
